channel.title: Food on Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Food on Thoughts

item.title: Food consumption by country
item.description: Output from this script provides charts of consumption of various food categories (in terms of kg/person/year) by country. The data is sourced from Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations as of 2018 and published by nu3. The script extracts an html table data from the website, tidies the extracted data, and, generates charts. The script is virtually all written by Kasia Kulma. url <- "https://www.nu3.de/blogs/nutrition/food-carbon-footprint-index-2018" us_foodplot china_foodplot india_foodplot Japan_foodplot Nigeria_foodplot uschina_foodplot usindia_foodplot indiachina_foodplot franceus_foodplot franceindia_foodplot Table 1: Country list x Argentina Australia Albania Iceland New Zealand USA Uruguay Luxembourg Brazil Kazakhstan Sweden Bermuda Denmark Finland Ireland Greece France Canada Norway Hong Kong SAR.
